LanguageData.Gun_Revolver.label: Colt M1911
LanguageData.Gun_Revolver.description: Ancient pattern automatic pistol. Weak and short range, but quick.
LanguageData.Gun_Revolver.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.Gun_Revolver.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_Revolver.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Deringer.label: Revolver Smith&Wesson M1917
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Deringer.description: A Smith&Wesson M1917 revolver. Accurate at short range only, moderately damaging with a short aim- and cooldown period.
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Deringer.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Deringer.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Deringer.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.RF_Gun_AT2K.label: Sphinx AT 2000
LanguageData.RF_Gun_AT2K.description: A high quality and highly durable handgun, used by elite forces and sports shooters. Great accuracy, moderate damage and a tad slow.
LanguageData.RF_Gun_AT2K.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.RF_Gun_AT2K.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.RF_Gun_AT2K.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.RF_Gun_93R.label: Beretta 93R
LanguageData.RF_Gun_93R.description: A nice-looking machinepistol with a very fast burstfire mode, low stopping power and hits up to pistol range.
LanguageData.RF_Gun_93R.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.RF_Gun_93R.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.RF_Gun_93R.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.RF_Gun_VektorCP.label: Vektor CP1
LanguageData.RF_Gun_VektorCP.description: An ergonomical handgun with a drastically non-rectangular design. Good accuracy and low recoil, but weak and with a slightly lower range.
LanguageData.RF_Gun_VektorCP.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.RF_Gun_VektorCP.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.RF_Gun_VektorCP.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.Gun_Autopistol.label: Para Ordnance P14-45
LanguageData.Gun_Autopistol.description: A counterfeit ancient 45 ACP handgun with slightly improved internal mechanisms and plastic frame. High accuracy and above average range, average fire rate and damage.
LanguageData.Gun_Autopistol.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.Gun_Autopistol.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_Autopistol.tools.2.label: muzzle
